title: Anglo American plc Upgraded to “Sector Perform” at RBC Capital (AAUKY)
content: RBC Capital upgraded shares of Anglo American plc (OTC:AAUKY) from an underperform rating to a sector perform rating in a report released on Monday morning, MarketBeat reports. Shares of Anglo American plc (OTC:AAUKY) opened at 5.72 on Monday. The stock has a 50 day moving average of $5.73 and a 200-day moving average of $7.25. […]
